en.title: GitHub Playbook for Solana Learners
en.description: How to read repos, examples, and issues without deep coding experience.
tldr: Start with README, examples folder, then open issues.
Focus on release notes to spot breaking changes.
en.body:
## Read from top to bottom

Start with README and quickstart. Then open the simplest example project and run it locally.

## Use issues as learning material

Closed issues often explain failure modes better than tutorials.

## Track changes

Watch repository releases so you know when guides become outdated.

en.title: Reading Solana Docs Without Getting Lost
en.description: A practical order for reading core documentation as a beginner.
tldr: Start from account model and transaction basics before advanced topics.
Keep notes for wallet setup, fees, and confirmation flow.
en.body:
## Why docs first

Official docs are useful when you read them in the right sequence. Beginners usually jump into advanced pages too early.

## Suggested reading order

1. Accounts and programs
2. Transactions and fees
3. RPC and explorers
4. Tooling and frameworks

## How to take notes

Write one short note for each page:
- What problem this concept solves
- One real action you can do next
- One risk to avoid

en.title: Wallet Safety Checklist for Day 1
en.description: Simple, non-technical steps to protect your wallet from common mistakes.
tldr: Use a dedicated wallet and separate hot and cold storage.
Verify destination addresses before each transfer.
en.body:
## Separate wallets by purpose

Use one wallet for testing and one for long-term storage. This lowers risk when you try new apps.

## Protect seed phrases

Store backup phrases offline in at least two safe locations. Do not keep them in screenshots or cloud notes.

## Confirm before signing

Check recipient address, token amount, and network before every signature.

en.title: YouTube Walkthrough: Your First SOL Transfer
en.description: How to watch tutorials critically and avoid risky copy-paste behavior.
tldr: Follow creators who explain why each step matters.
Recreate actions on small amounts first.
en.body:
## Pick tutorial quality signals

Choose videos that show wallet confirmations clearly and mention risks.

## Rehearse with tiny value

Before larger transfers, do one tiny transaction and verify confirmation in an explorer.

## Keep your own checklist

Your learning speed improves when you document each action in your own words.

zh-CN.title: Solana 学习者的 GitHub 阅读法
zh-CN.description: 不写太多代码也能从仓库中学到关键知识。
tldr: 从 README、示例目录、Issues 三步阅读。
关注 release 说明判断资料是否过时。
zh-CN.body:
## 从结构开始

先看 README 和快速启动，再找最小示例运行一遍。

## 读已关闭问题

很多失败案例和修复思路都在 issue 讨论中。

## 跟踪版本

关注发布记录，避免继续使用旧接口。

zh-CN.title: 新手阅读 Solana 文档的顺序
zh-CN.description: 给初学者的文档阅读路径，避免一开始就陷入复杂细节。
tldr: 先读账户模型和交易基础，再看进阶章节。
针对钱包、手续费、确认流程做简要笔记。
zh-CN.body:
## 为什么先看文档

官方文档信息完整，但阅读顺序不对会很容易迷失。

## 建议顺序

1. 账户与程序
2. 交易与费用
3. RPC 与区块浏览器
4. 开发工具与框架

## 记录方式

每篇文档只记三件事：
- 解决什么问题
- 下一步可执行动作
- 可能踩坑点

zh-CN.title: 第 1 天钱包安全清单
zh-CN.description: 不需要技术背景也能执行的钱包安全规则。
tldr: 把体验钱包和长期钱包分开。
每次转账前二次确认地址。
zh-CN.body:
## 按用途拆分钱包

新工具测试与长期存储应分开，能显著降低风险。

## 助记词离线保存

至少两份离线备份，不要放在截图和云笔记中。

## 签名前检查

确认接收地址、数量、网络是否正确，再进行签名。

zh-CN.title: YouTube 实操：第一笔 SOL 转账
zh-CN.description: 如何看教程并避开照抄步骤带来的风险。
tldr: 优先看解释原理和风险的创作者。
先用小额资金演练全流程。
zh-CN.body:
## 筛选教程质量

优先选择会展示签名确认界面并说明风险的视频。

## 先小额测试

正式操作前先做一笔小额转账，并在浏览器确认结果。

## 建立自己的清单

把每步动作写下来，比只看视频更容易形成可复用习惯。

en.title: Five Beginner Errors and How to Avoid Them
en.description: Mistakes seen repeatedly in onboarding sessions.
en.body:
## Common pattern

Most mistakes happen from rushing transactions and skipping address checks.

## Better habit

Create a pre-sign checklist and treat every transfer as production-grade.

en.title: Your First Week with Solana: A Practical Plan
en.description: A seven-day structure that balances learning and safety.
en.body:
## Day-by-day focus

Set one concrete output per day: wallet setup, first transfer, explorer review, and one community question.

## Keep scope small

You do not need advanced DeFi tools in week one. Build fundamentals first.

zh-CN.title: 新手常见 5 个错误与规避方式
zh-CN.description: 高频踩坑点与可执行修正方案。
zh-CN.body:
## 高频问题

很多问题来自匆忙签名和未检查收款地址。

## 改进动作

建立签名前核对清单，把每次转账当作正式操作。

zh-CN.title: Solana 新手第一周行动计划
zh-CN.description: 用 7 天建立稳定学习节奏与安全习惯。
zh-CN.body:
## 每日目标

每天只完成一个清晰产出：钱包配置、首次转账、浏览器核对、社区提问。

## 控制范围

第一周先夯实基础，不必急着进入复杂 DeFi 工具。

en.title: Episode 1: Wallet Setup without Confusion
en.description: A short audio script on secure wallet onboarding.
en.body:
## Episode notes

We break down seed phrase handling, backup strategy, and confirmation hygiene.

en.title: Episode 2: Read a Transaction Explorer Like an Analyst
en.description: Learn the fields that matter for daily verification.
en.body:
## Episode notes

This episode explains status, slot, signatures, and fee interpretation.

zh-CN.title: 第 1 期：钱包配置不再混乱
zh-CN.description: 用音频方式讲清钱包安全上手。
zh-CN.body:
## 节目笔记

围绕助记词保存、备份策略和签名确认习惯展开。

zh-CN.title: 第 2 期：像分析师一样看交易浏览器
zh-CN.description: 理解日常核对必须看的字段。
zh-CN.body:
## 节目笔记

重点解释状态、slot、签名与手续费等关键字段。
